title: looking for a carry laner (carry top or mid) who can duo with me. i main jg (currently bronze 2)

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
so i play a BUNCH of nidalee jg, and usually i win a lot with her, but today ive been playing sooo well and losing every single game with 2/9 solo laners even after i get them a kill or 2... im looking for someone who can actually carry with a lead with me because i usually play a utility type of nidalee by focusing on getting vision, and vision denial. im currently bronze 2, but was S2 last season

(and if u think im just complaining about bad teams when in reality im not doing well myself, look at my match history...)

Anyways, add me

replies.body: Im up for it. If you dont think im trash and all :D

Do you have LoLreply?
If you can send me your game play files and can have a look if you want.
Seeing what you are doing wrong, and how you can do better.

stuff like this, im always happy to help others improve.
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI
no i dont have that.. What is it?

its a program/app witch is riot approved.
When installed and used, it will save every league you play as a spectated match (Witch is pretty cool)
You then should be able to view your own game at any time, and send that game file to others.

I do recommend giving it a shot, and if you dont like it. Simply uninstall.
IGN: Smoochie, mid/ top or sup

Hey there! I main mid and I'm not the best(recently hit Lvl30) but I do have a pretty decent winrate with my 2 main champs, Ahri(56%, peak was 65% but...let's just say I'm a lot worse at her now than at around lvl24) and Lux(61%). Just tell me if you wanna duo(it's kinda awkward when I add someone and they're like 'umm do I know you?' xD), cya for now!:)

BTW here's my op.gg profile: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=iDeadly
